message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly work towards a mutually beneficial price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This would still be a great deal for you considering the value you'll gain.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep my expenses within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate further towards $10,250?
